description:
Jil and his gang reach the next floor, and run into Melt and Coopa. A grandiose mansion appears before them, where Ahmey, who was supposed to be dead, is awaiting them. Kally also appears. Jil is happy to meet his old friends, but at the same time is bewildered. In exchange for their delight in meeting old comrades, the gang gradually looses their eagerness to proceed. Then, Specula, Blood, and Ice launch an assault on them.
Source: crunchyroll
